title: Runtime of algorithm for online retailer

content.description: An online retailer uses an algorithm to sort a list of n items by price. The table below shows the approximate number of steps the algorithm takes to sort lists of different sizes.
content.question: Based on the values in the table, which of the following best characterizes the algorithm for very large values of n ?

choices.label: The algorithm runs in reasonable time.
The algorithm runs, but not in reasonable time.
The algorithm attempts to solve an undecidable problem.
The algorithm attempts to find an approximate solution whenever it fails to find an exact solution.

content.answer: The algorithm runs in reasonable time.
